sentences.en: A blithe heart makes a blooming visage.
Don't nip any stalks off till the plant's through blooming.
sentences.cn: 在植物盛开之前不要掐掉它的梗.

sentences.en: Even though we split up she was blooming marvellous.
sentences.cn: 虽然我们分手了，但她确实很了不起。

sentences.en: Flowers of all sorts are blooming in a riot of colour.
Her blooming full - pulsed youth stood there in a moral imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 她那充满活力,跃跃欲试的青春,遭到了精神上的禁锢.

sentences.en: Hundreds of flowers are blooming in profusion.
If they were blooming with confidence they wouldn't need me.
sentences.cn: 他们要是信心百倍的话，也就不会叫我了。

sentences.en: It is spring only when all the flowers are blooming.
It's a blooming nuisance because it frightens my dog to death.
sentences.cn: 它真让人讨厌，快把我的狗吓死了。

sentences.en: Palmer Kirby had wakened late blooming lusts in her.
sentences.cn: 巴穆·柯比在她心中煽动起一片迟暮的情欲.

sentences.en: The garden is blooming with spring flowers.
They'll look at Madeleine, blooming and lovely.
sentences.cn: 他们要看看马德琳,她青春焕发, 娇柔可爱.

words.tran_cn: [机] 初轧机；从前女用灯笼裤；纰漏；开花植物

trans.tran_cn: 盛开的，妙龄的，<俚>十足的、非常的，开坯
trans.tran_en: used for emphasizing a remark, especially when you are angry or surprised
